title: Murder At The Green Lantern
description: Paranormal gay sleuth Corey Shaw returns for a new investigation in this hot sequel to Breathless. After a fetish party at a gay bar in Washington, DC, a young man is murdered and left nailed to a St. Andrew's Cross. Paranormal gay sleuth Corey Shaw thinks someone has passed a divine judgment on him, and may be a signal to other gays in the city. The mystery leads him on a trail from Boston to the halls of the U.S. Capitol Building in DC.
author: Alex Morgan
